name: Don't Leave Me Hanging
description:
This prototype was submitted for Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2021!

[WARNING! Due to issues when WebGL, we recommend that this game is played on Google Chrome or Microsoft Edge. Browsers such as Brave do not seem to be working.]

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

"Don't Leave Me Hanging"  is a single player mouse-based game where you must avoid being awkward at a party by greeting strangers with the right handshake! Impress each challenger with a well-executed greeting, and you'll catch everyone's attention at the party! 

To do this, choose the correct grip, timing and position for the perfect handshake! If you slip up, things can get awkward... You don't want to play weird guy and get kicked out, do ya? You've been waiting so long for this... to hang out with a new crowd! So don’t leave ’em hanging!!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Controls:

Mouse: hand movement

Space: cycle handshake / "accept" handshake

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Resources

Engine: Unity2020.3.11f1

Art: 2D - Adobe Photoshop & Clip Studio Paint

Programming: Visual Studio

Sound: FL Studio
